sentences.sContent: His thinking, he said, has taken on a “staccato” quality, reflecting the way he quickly scans short passages of text from many sources online.
sentences.sContent_eng: His thinking, he said, has taken on a “staccato” quality, reflecting the way he quickly scans short passages of text from many sources online.
sentences.sCn: 他的思想，他说道，已经呈现出一种“断奏”的特性了，这反映为他在线上众多资源中，常常快速浏览短小文章段落的方式上。

sentences.sContent: While you may not be able to hear the heartbeat through a sonogram or Doppler for a few weeks yet when you finally do the rapid staccato beats will be concrete evidence of the life inside you.
sentences.sContent_eng: While you may not be able to hear the heartbeat through a sonogram or Doppler for a few weeks yet when you finally do the rapid staccato beats will be concrete evidence of the life inside you.
sentences.sCn: 在几周内，你可能还不能够通过声波图或者多普勒超声听到婴儿的心跳，但当你最终听到时，那快速的断断续续的节奏巩固你身体里有个小生命的证据。

sentences.sContent: She chews him out in a staccato of Hebrew, while he stares passively at her.
sentences.sContent_eng: She chews him out in a staccato of Hebrew, while he stares passively at her.
sentences.sCn: 她以一种希伯来式的断音责骂着这位年轻人，而对方只能被动的瞪着她。

sentences.sContent: He spoke in Arabic, a short staccato burst.
sentences.sCn: 他突然用阿拉伯语叽里呱啦说了一串话。

trans.tranOther: A staccato noise consists of a series of short, sharp, separate sounds
if music is played staccato, the notes are cut short
